item.title: Audible’s Best Promo of the Year Ends Soon: How to Get Three Free Months of Audiobooks
item.description: Amazon Prime members can take advantage of the deal, while non-members get their first three months for less than $1 per month.

item.title: Prime Video’s ‘Every Summer After’ Series Adaptation Unveils Cast
item.description: The streamer announced the lineup set to star in the series based on the New York Times best-selling novel by Carley Fortune.

item.title: Christina Applegate to Publish Memoir ‘You With the Sad Eyes’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The actress’ first book was acquired by Little, Brown and Company and will release in March 2026.

item.title: How Social Media Is Fueling Gen Z’s Sex Recession
item.description: For her new book, journalist Carter Sherman interviewed over 100 young people about why they’re not having sex. She says they’re “very horny” but also more isolated, self-conscious, and fearful.

item.title: How Social Media Is Fueling Gen Z’s Sex Recession
item.description: For her new book, journalist Carter Sherman interviewed over 100 young people about why they’re not having sex. She says they’re “very horny” but also more isolated, self-conscious, and fearful.

item.title: ‘The Salt Path’ Fallout: Raynor Winn’s Next Book Delayed as Publisher Supports “Distressed” Author
item.description: After an investigation cast into doubt the events of her best-selling memoir, Winn’s publisher has been forced to delay her next book, ‘On Winter Hill.’

item.title: ‘The Salt Path’ Fallout: Raynor Winn’s Next Book Delayed as Publisher Supports “Distressed” Author
item.description: After an investigation cast into doubt the events of her best-selling memoir, Winn’s publisher has been forced to delay her next book, ‘On Winter Hill.’
